description: Updates the policies for the specified container registry.

trustpolicy.description: An object that represents content trust policy for a container registry.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group to which the container registry belongs.

registry_name.description: The name of the container registry.

registry_policies_update_parameters.description: The parameters for updating policies of a container registry.

quarantinepolicy.description: An object that represents quarantine policy for a container registry.
